scripts.build: npm run build:touch && npm run build:preprocess && npm run uglify && rm buffer_desktop.js && rm buffer_mobile.js
scripts.build:touch: rm -rf build/ && mkdir build && touch build/desktopnav-elm.js && touch build/mobilenav-elm.js
scripts.build:preprocess: elm make src/DesktopNav.elm --optimize --output=buffer_desktop.js && elm make src/MobileNav.elm --optimize --output=buffer_mobile.js
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify:desktop && npm run uglify:mobile
